channel.title: Need help plzz!
channel.description:
how can i enter login Have The Same IP?
when I try to enter shows "login limit exceeded to many connections from your address" how i can remove it for more Same IP login with any help plss
can any help me plzz ;D

item.title: Need help plzz!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

open up client.java and search for

uncomment this code below to stop multiple logins from 1

and comment all of this

for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }

this however I think is for delta only, because you didnt provide ure base or deob.

Read full topic
